patthana24.17:4.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.17:4.2: Naaraṇaṃ nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.17:4.4: Hetuyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
patthana24.17:5.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.17:5.2: Naaraṇaṃ naahetukañceva nanahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.17:5.4: Hetuyā dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
